snippet: While Donald J. Trump may not have been their top choice, the adherents of socially conservative ideologies believe the alternative — Hillary Clinton — would be far worse.
abstract: Social conservatives are slowly warming to presumptive Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump, joining mainstream Republicans in supporting candidate they once opposed; many social conservatives are choosing to look past Trump's flaws and lack of faith in hopes that he will become convert, in process offering ideological and financial backing of significant portion of Republican base.
lead_paragraph: While Donald J. Trump may not have been their top choice, the adherents of socially conservative ideologies believe the alternative — Hillary Clinton — would be far worse.

headline.main: Social Conservatives, However Reluctant, Are Warming to the Idea of Trump
headline.print_headline: Once Against, Another Flank  of G.O.P. Warms Up to Trump
